jobTitle: 7731 - Technical Support - Engineering Stock Room Data Analyst Auburn
jobDescription: The Engineering Stockroom Data Analyst position is an integral part of Prototype Vehicle Operations and Pilot Builds. The individual will be required to document, track and communicate part issues to ensure timely resolutions. They will obtain quotes, generate NPM numbers as needed, write orders and follow up on deliveries. The position will manage part dispersals and shortages from Engineering, as well as run monthly aging reports to deem any material as potential scrap. They will assist in inventory verification audits on a random basis. The candidate will be responsible for ordering and scheduling deliveries of fuel in abundance of $5M. The Engineering Stockroom Data Analyst will support all continuous improvement activities. Communication between the stockrooms, engineers and management is required on a regular basis; major issue escalation is expected. On-time delivery is a common goal among our team, and the Engineering Stockroom Data Analyst will be essential to providing successful Prototype and Pilot Vehicle builds.  Review, analyze, and evaluate various systems operations. Documents, tracks, and monitors the problem to ensure timely resolution. Performs advance root cause analysis and develops checklists for typical problems. Provide technical support on a variety of issues. Escalate problems to next level support professionals when necessary.
